basic_information.scholarship_notes: Awarded in the Fall by committee.
basic_information.college_name: College of Fine Arts and Design

description: This scholarship was established in 2010 by then Associate Dean Dr. Gayle Kearns to recruit and retain oboe students, with first priority to returning junior and senior students and second priority for recruiting incoming freshmen. Eligibility Oboe student First priority to juniors and seniors Second priority to incoming freshmen Requirements AWARDED BY COMMITTEE NOMINATION. Nominated student(s) will be invited to apply by the college's scholarship coordinator.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
